thread.section_title: PACK & SEND Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PACK & SEND Australia | www.packsend.com.au | 2 of 119
thread.title: Shelley Andersson
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Shelley Andersson

author: Shelley Andersson
title: Shelley Andersson
text:
I have had a lot of issues with couriers in the past, they wouldn't communicate if they were unable to pick up / deliver a package and there was never any accountability for mistakes made and refunds were a nightmare!
With Pack and Send I had to cancel an order and resend and there was no drama, it was raised and resolved in the same day! They also notified me via email when a courier was unable to pick up one of my boxes, this level of transparency isn't provided anymore even though it is crucial to the overall customer experience.
The deliveries / pick ups I have organised have all been on time with no delays and the price I've paid wasn't over the top for the service.
I will be using Pack and Send as my courier from now!
